abstract: Ghazal singer Jagjit Singh was loved by millions.
snippet: Ghazal singer Jagjit Singh was loved by millions.
lead_paragraph: The death of velvet-voiced singer Jagjit Singh, widely credited for reviving the popularity of classical Hindustani love songs in Urdu, known as ghazals, spurred an outpouring of tributes and emotion from fans and musicians on Tuesday.

headline.main: In His Voice, There Is Peace
